title: Unnaithaan Ninaikayila Lyrics Pazhaya Vannarapettai
stanzas:
Unnathaan nenaikaiyila
arathiri thookkamilla
kannu rendum kalanguthadi
kanavuku kai kodudi(2)

Unnathaan nenaikaiyila
arathiri thookkamilla
kannu rendum kalanguthadi
kanavuku kai kodudi

Unna naan purinjikala
enna nee purinjikkala(2)
yen manam vaadudhu
un manam vaadala (2)

eppa nee enna
purinjikka pora
enn nee eppa
kaipudikka pora

Unnathaan nenaikaiyila
arathiri thookkamilla
kannu rendum kalanguthadi
kanavuku kai kodudi (2)

Unakenna pudichathaala
en manasa unaku thandhen(2)
manasa madhikkama
panatha madhichuputta

panam mattum vazhkaiyilla
inbam thunbam rendum undu
adiye vazhkaiyile
kadhal modhal rendum undu

Unnathaan nenaikaiyila
arathiri thookkamilla
kannu rendum kalanguthadi
kanavuku kai kodudi(2)
